meanings.sent1: She respells the word until it is correct.
meanings.sent2: He respells the name to make it easier to read.
meanings.sent3: The magician respells the magic words and turns the rabbit into a hat!
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting respells the story of her life in beautiful cursive.
meanings.sent5: The teacher respells the tricky words to help the students remember them better.

meanings.sent1: The witch respells the potion to make it more potent.
meanings.sent2: He respells the incantation to change its effect.
meanings.sent3: The chef respells the recipe and creates a new delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist respells the colors on the canvas to create a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The composer respells the notes to compose a haunting melody.
